channel.title: I need help on my mopar server
channel.description:
Hm... bascaly I need a good pk source... must of them have that skull and -wildy lvl stuff which makes it inpossible to use tele spells.... I dont want that... I just want a source that allows you to atk people anywhere besides safe zones...
also could someone make a TUT on how to scrpit safe zones and how to set drops on monsters...
Anyone that helps me will be givin MOD access on my server maybe Admin if you have ideas or i need more help from you...
such as... how to script the crystal chest and muddychest... ;D THANKS!
